description: This source file provides functions related to extracting and formatting version information from a given dictionary object. It defines two functions: GetVersion, which extracts version components from the info dict, and GetVersionString, which returns a string representation of the version.

methods.name: GetVersion(info)
methods.description: Extracts the major, minor, and patch version numbers from the input info dictionary, handling different formats (list or string). Defaults to version 1.0.0 if no version info is provided.

methods.name: GetVersionString(info)
methods.description: Returns a string representation of the version by calling GetVersion and joining its components with periods.
